Welcome to Rosoom Your Smart way to Pay

ABOUT

Founded in 2008 Rosoom is the primary online payment gateway for the Trading Community in Dubai.

Centralized

Facilitates online payments for major Free zones, Ports & various other key organizations in UAE.

Advanced

Facilitates online payments for major Free zones, Ports & various other key organizations in UAE.

Secured

Facilitates online payments for major Free zones, Ports & various other key organizations in UAE.

WHY ROSSOM

Multiple Payment Methods
Including Credit Card, Direct Debit and e-Dirham.
Integration with all web portals
Ready to use API for simple and smooth integration.
Free Upgrades
No additional cost for ongoing system enhancements.
Mobile Payment
Pay effortlessly on the move with smart phones.
Real-time Reports
Access to all transactional and settlement reports instantly.
